workflow_id.description: A unique identifier automatically generated for this workflow.

timestamp.description: The epoch time when this workflow was created.

priority.description: The workflow's priority level relative to other workflows.

anyOf.description: The epoch time when message queues were created for this workflow. If null, the queues have not yet been created.

_mq_activation_retry_at_ts.description: For internal use only: The epoch time to retry requesting message queues from MQS.

deactivated.description: Indicates whether the workflow has been deactivated.
